name: Fish-Boy
description:
Something Fishy

The true story of a fish out of water, you are a fish person attempting to find a better life on land, but your water supply is dwindling and you must find water along your way to stay alive. Fish-Boy is a fast-paced procedural runner game where any breath might be your last!

Cool Features
  • The best platforming you'll see all day
  • Infinite levels that only somewhat repeat
  • Cool fishy animations

Fish Boy was made for Ludum Dare 39, if you also participated then we would really appreciate the feedback on the ludum dare website, our project page is here.

Post-Jam Changes

Some small optimization changes and platforming 'feel' changes. Get this if you want to play the game and get the old version if you want to review it as it was finished on the weekend.
